entries.title: The miscommunication at metro
entries.whatHappened: When she is asking vishal to calm down on some home issue vishal replied with rudeness.
entries.howWeSolved: At that time nandani shows a really mature behaviour and just didn't react and wait for vishal to calm down.
entries.lesson: If one of us are angry another one tried to calm down beucase after some time the angry one automatically realises the issue and change it.
